title: when can i play?
body: i downloaded the game three days ago from the official site and since the game is downloading a hell update an about 5 gigabyte of data had been downloaded to my hard drive , my internet provider says that i exceeded my download limitation and i bought new package so i can play that fucking game and still it downloads updates what a fuck! this never ends , you can say that god damn game has unlimited resources the fucking patch downloading data for 3 days and still downloading and says the estimated time is 1082 minutes i just wanna know what is wrong? is it me? the game? i don't known (the download speed is 98 kb/s) - when i run game there is no "play" button only downloading progress bar

replies.body: It's not exactly a mobile game brother. It's just as big as any other game out there. I have a terrabyte of hard-drive, I thought you could never use that much in your life as I lived before floppy discs. Ancient relics of an age since passed.

The game does need to download and update to the latest patch before the Play button will become available. It really sucks that it's been taking so long for it to download, but if you're trying to download 5GB of data with only 100kb/s download speed then it will probably take quite awhile. I definitely don't want you using up all of your own data *just* trying to download the game, so (if you're on a laptop) maybe you could use something like a pc cafe or a library to get the game downloaded first.
